posts.post_content: What do you get when [Ball Lightning](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ball Lightning) and [Deadly Insect](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Deadly Insect) make a baby? Cap'n Tickles, of course. A dangerous creature in two colors that like unsolvable threats, with trample, which helps trigger Bloodthirst and force extra damage through if blocked. An aggressive 4-drop that could find its way into many decks, and as a hybrid rather than a gold creature, is great in mono-red or green as well. Thankfully it wasn't given 6 power, or else it would have been broken.
